summary: Email from attorney Marc A. Weinstein to Andrew Tomback responding to a grand jury subpoena request for prior trust documents referenced in Jeffrey Epstein's wills. The email includes attachments with Bates-numbered documents from the Epstein estate.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Attorney, Partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: Author of the email responding to a grand jury subpoena request for trust documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Addressee of the email regarding the grand jury subpoena response for Epstein trust documents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased individual whose estate is subject to grand jury subpoena
persons.context: Mentioned as the deceased person whose prior wills and trusts are being subpoenaed by a grand jury.

connections.description: Weinstein is communicating with Tomback regarding a legal matter involving grand jury subpoenas for Epstein estate documents.
Weinstein appears to be acting as legal counsel or representative in matters related to Epstein's estate, based on his response to the grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Production of trust documents in response to grand jury subpoena
events.description: Marc A. Weinstein sends email with attached trust documents (Bates G.1_000406 through G1_000459) in response to a grand jury subpoena request related to Jeffrey Epstein's prior wills and trusts.

events.title: Production of prior wills of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Prior wills of Jeffrey Epstein were produced, referenced in the email as part of the grand jury subpoena process.

events.title: Grand jury subpoenas issued to Epstein estate executors
events.description: Grand jury subpoenas were issued to the executors of Jeffrey Epstein's estate, mentioned as the basis for the document request.

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued on October 18, 2019 to the executors of Jeffrey Epstein's estate, indicating ongoing investigation after his death.
Prior wills of Jeffrey Epstein were produced on January 16, 2020, and referenced trust documents were subsequently produced on January 24, 2020.
Attorney Marc A. Weinstein of Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP responded to the subpoena request by providing documents with Bates numbers G.1_000406 through G1_000459.
The email correspondence demonstrates continued legal proceedings and document production related to Epstein's estate following his death.
